<a id="class_SpinBox"></a>

# SpinBox

**Inherits:** [Range](class_range.md) **<** [Control](class_control.md) **<** [CanvasItem](class_canvasitem.md) **<** [Node](class_node.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

An input field for numbers.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**SpinBox** is a numerical input text field. It allows entering integers and floating-point numbers. The **SpinBox** also has up and down buttons that can be clicked increase or decrease the value. The value can also be changed by dragging the mouse up or down over the **SpinBox**'s arrows.

Additionally, mathematical expressions can be entered. These are evaluated when the user presses :kbd:`Enter` while editing the **SpinBox**'s text field. This uses the [Expression](class_expression.md) class to parse and evaluate the expression. The result of the expression is then set as the value of the **SpinBox**. Some examples of valid expressions are ``5 + 2 * 3``, ``pow(2, 4)``, and ``PI + sin(0.5)``. Expressions are case-sensitive.

\ **Example:** Create a **SpinBox**, disable its context menu and set its text alignment to right.




```gdscript
    var spin_box = SpinBox.new()
    add_child(spin_box)
    var line_edit = spin_box.get_line_edit()
    line_edit.context_menu_enabled = false
    spin_box.horizontal_alignment = LineEdit.HORIZONTAL_ALIGNMENT_RIGHT
```

```csharp
    var spinBox = new SpinBox();
    AddChild(spinBox);
    var lineEdit = spinBox.GetLineEdit();
    lineEdit.ContextMenuEnabled = false;
    spinBox.AlignHorizontal = LineEdit.HorizontalAlignEnum.Right;
```



See [Range](class_range.md) class for more options over the **SpinBox**.

\ **Note:** With the **SpinBox**'s context menu disabled, you can right-click the bottom half of the spinbox to set the value to its minimum, while right-clicking the top half sets the value to its maximum.

\ **Note:** **SpinBox** relies on an underlying [LineEdit](class_lineedit.md) node. To theme a **SpinBox**'s background, add theme items for [LineEdit](class_lineedit.md) and customize them. The [LineEdit](class_lineedit.md) has the ``SpinBoxInnerLineEdit`` theme variation, so that you can give it a distinct appearance from regular [LineEdit](class_lineedit.md)\ s.

\ **Note:** If you want to implement drag and drop for the underlying [LineEdit](class_lineedit.md), you can use [Control.set_drag_forwarding()](class_control.md#class_Control_method_set_drag_forwarding) on the node returned by [get_line_edit()](class_spinbox.md#class_SpinBox_method_get_line_edit).

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_SpinBox_property_alignment"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[HorizontalAlignment](class_@globalscope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_HorizontalAlignment) **alignment** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_SpinBox_property_alignment)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_horizontal_alignment**\ (\ value\: [HorizontalAlignment](class_@globalscope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_HorizontalAlignment)\ )
- [HorizontalAlignment](class_@globalscope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_HorizontalAlignment) **get_horizontal_alignment**\ (\ )

Changes the alignment of the underlying [LineEdit](class_lineedit.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SpinBox_property_custom_arrow_step"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **custom_arrow_step** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_SpinBox_property_custom_arrow_step)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_custom_arrow_step**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_custom_arrow_step**\ (\ )

If not ``0``, sets the step when interacting with the arrow buttons of the **SpinBox**.

\ **Note:** [Range.value](class_range.md#class_Range_property_value) will still be rounded to a multiple of [Range.step](class_range.md#class_Range_property_step).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SpinBox_property_editable"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **editable** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#class_SpinBox_property_editable)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_editable**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_editable**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the **SpinBox** will be editable. Otherwise, it will be read only.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SpinBox_property_prefix"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](class_string.md) **prefix** = `""` [ðŸ”—](#class_SpinBox_property_prefix)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_prefix**\ (\ value\: [String](class_string.md)\ )
- [String](class_string.md) **get_prefix**\ (\ )

Adds the specified prefix string before the numerical value of the **SpinBox**.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SpinBox_property_select_all_on_focus"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **select_all_on_focus** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_SpinBox_property_select_all_on_focus)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_select_all_on_focus**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_select_all_on_focus**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the **SpinBox** will select the whole text when the [LineEdit](class_lineedit.md) gains focus. Clicking the up and down arrows won't trigger this behavior.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SpinBox_property_suffix"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](class_string.md) **suffix** = `""` [ðŸ”—](#class_SpinBox_property_suffix)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_suffix**\ (\ value\: [String](class_string.md)\ )
- [String](class_string.md) **get_suffix**\ (\ )

Adds the specified suffix string after the numerical value of the **SpinBox**.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SpinBox_property_update_on_text_changed"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **update_on_text_changed** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_SpinBox_property_update_on_text_changed)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_update_on_text_changed**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **get_update_on_text_changed**\ (\ )

Sets the value of the [Range](class_range.md) for this **SpinBox** when the [LineEdit](class_lineedit.md) text is *changed* instead of *submitted*. See [LineEdit.text_changed](class_lineedit.md#class_LineEdit_signal_text_changed) and [LineEdit.text_submitted](class_lineedit.md#class_LineEdit_signal_text_submitted).

\ **Note:** If set to ``true``, this will interfere with entering mathematical expressions in the **SpinBox**. The **SpinBox** will try to evaluate the expression as you type, which means symbols like a trailing ``+`` are removed immediately by the expression being evaluated.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_SpinBox_method_apply"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **apply**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_SpinBox_method_apply)

Applies the current value of this **SpinBox**. This is equivalent to pressing :kbd:`Enter` while editing the [LineEdit](class_lineedit.md) used by the **SpinBox**. This will cause [LineEdit.text_submitted](class_lineedit.md#class_LineEdit_signal_text_submitted) to be emitted and its currently contained expression to be evaluated.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SpinBox_method_get_line_edit"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[LineEdit](class_lineedit.md) **get_line_edit**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_SpinBox_method_get_line_edit)

Returns the [LineEdit](class_lineedit.md) instance from this **SpinBox**. You can use it to access properties and methods of [LineEdit](class_lineedit.md).

\ **Warning:** This is a required internal node, removing and freeing it may cause a crash. If you wish to hide it or any of its children, use their [CanvasItem.visible](class_canvasitem.md#class_CanvasItem_property_visible) property.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Theme Property Descriptions

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SpinBox_theme_constant_buttons_vertical_separation"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](class_int.md) **buttons_vertical_separation** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_SpinBox_theme_constant_buttons_vertical_separation)

Vertical separation between the up and down buttons.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SpinBox_theme_constant_buttons_width"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](class_int.md) **buttons_width** = `16` [ðŸ”—](#class_SpinBox_theme_constant_buttons_width)

Width of the up and down buttons. If smaller than any icon set on the buttons, the respective icon may overlap neighboring elements. If smaller than ``0``, the width is automatically adjusted from the icon size.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SpinBox_theme_constant_field_and_buttons_separation"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](class_int.md) **field_and_buttons_separation** = `2` [ðŸ”—](#class_SpinBox_theme_constant_field_and_buttons_separation)

Width of the horizontal separation between the text input field ([LineEdit](class_lineedit.md)) and the buttons.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SpinBox_theme_constant_set_min_buttons_width_from_icons"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](class_int.md) **set_min_buttons_width_from_icons** = `1` [ðŸ”—](#class_SpinBox_theme_constant_set_min_buttons_width_from_icons)

If not ``0``, the minimum button width corresponds to the widest of all icons set on those buttons, even if [buttons_width](class_spinbox.md#class_SpinBox_theme_constant_buttons_width) is smaller.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SpinBox_theme_icon_down"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **down** [ðŸ”—](#class_SpinBox_theme_icon_down)

Down button icon, displayed in the middle of the down (value-decreasing) button.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SpinBox_theme_icon_updown"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **updown** [ðŸ”—](#class_SpinBox_theme_icon_updown)

Single texture representing both the up and down buttons icons. It is displayed in the middle of the buttons and does not change upon interaction. If a valid icon is assigned, it will replace [up](class_spinbox.md#class_SpinBox_theme_icon_up) and [down](class_spinbox.md#class_SpinBox_theme_icon_down).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SpinBox_theme_style_down_background"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](class_stylebox.md) **down_background** [ðŸ”—](#class_SpinBox_theme_style_down_background)

Background style of the down button.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SpinBox_theme_style_down_background_disabled"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](class_stylebox.md) **down_background_disabled** [ðŸ”—](#class_SpinBox_theme_style_down_background_disabled)

Background style of the down button when disabled.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SpinBox_theme_style_down_background_hovered"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](class_stylebox.md) **down_background_hovered** [ðŸ”—](#class_SpinBox_theme_style_down_background_hovered)

Background style of the down button when hovered.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SpinBox_theme_style_down_background_pressed"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](class_stylebox.md) **down_background_pressed** [ðŸ”—](#class_SpinBox_theme_style_down_background_pressed)

Background style of the down button when being pressed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_SpinBox_theme_style_field_and_buttons_separator"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](class_stylebox.md) **field_and_buttons_separator** [ðŸ”—](#class_SpinBox_theme_style_field_and_buttons_separator)

[StyleBox](class_stylebox.md) drawn in the space occupied by the separation between the input field and the buttons.
